name: wp
//: npm scripts are commands that get run in the terminal. We can configure them here.

scripts.//: test and start can be run by inputting 'npm test' or 'npm start' into the terminal
respectively. Everything else can be run with: 'npm run <command name>'
we want to make sure we use the locally installed version of webpack so we give it
a path to the script in node_modules
webpack-dev-server watches for changes, builds your app and then serves it
the inline option means that it will refresh your app every time it rebuilds
